results.title: Hot lead and cold feet
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Ron Miller and Robert Butler
results.brief_description: A Walt Disney comedy about a pioneer who has founded the small town of Bloodshy. With the assistance of his twin sons, Eli discovers he must fight for control of the town’s future against the town’s corrupt mayor. With Jim Dale playing the three main roles this is essentially a family oriented adventure film set in the old Wild West, replete with gunslingers and outlaws. Cast also includes Karen Valentine, Don Knotts, Jack Elam and John Williams.

results.title: Hot glass
results.creator_credit: National Film School (Great Britain) and John Tchalenko
results.brief_description: Several expert glass makers demonstrate their skills and techniques. Includes Simon Pearce, Fred Daden, Wilki Adolpson, Dale Chihuly, Jamie Carpenter and Gianni Toss.

results.title: Hot earth
results.brief_description: Rotorua is famous for its geysers which every year attract many tourists. This film shows how a geyser works, tracing the cycle of its operation. Today, research is being carried into geothermal power, in an attempt to harness it for industrial use.

results.title: Hot date
results.creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, Dennis Tupicoff and Kelly Wallwork
results.brief_description: Ingredients; one girl, one boy, and one Mexican cantina. The tale is of one woman’s experience of a date - the anxieties, trials and tribulations of trying to begin a relationship, which must inevitably begin with the first date. It doesn’t always go according to plan.

results.title: Hot curry cowboy
results.creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, Luigi Acquisto and Justin Hutchison
results.brief_description: A stranger from the West, Indian actor Billy “Butch” Bathshebas (Vejay Shanmugam), arrives in Australia fresh from the glitz of the Bombay studios. In correspondence to his father back home, Billy initially embellishes his flourishing cowboy life and acting career in Australia, that is until he lands a part in a chip commercial. On the set he meets a “real” cowboy, and the two are pitted in an ultimate showdown which has surprising results.

results.title: Hot air affair
results.creator_credit: Grainger Maynard, Greg Grainger and Damon Smith
results.brief_description: Follows the adventures of an all-female hot air ballooning team as they embark upon an international balloon race across Australia. The journey is not all smooth going, a few of the incidents include the balloon hitting a house and catching alight before finishing the spectaular, daring challenge.

results.title: Hot-dogger!
results.brief_description: A non-narrated look at the world of freestyle skiing. Shows serial flips, ballet and mogul skiing, and uses extreme slow motion to show skiers almost motionless inmidair as they fly thorugh single, double and Moebius flips. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: Hostellers
results.creator_credit: British Transport Films, Edgar H. Anstey and Gloria Sachs
results.brief_description: The conversion of a canal barge into a youth hostel by voluntary working parties has created Britain’s first “hostel on water”. Two of the many youth hostellers involved give personal comments and observations on hostelling: how the hostels are run, the facilities offered, what hostelling means to them individually and how their lives are involved in it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: British Transport Films, Edgar H. Anstey and Gloria Sachs

results.title: Hostage
results.creator_credit: Portman Entertainment Group, Independent Image, Tyne Tees Television, Jorge Estrada Mora Producciones, Tom Kinnimont and Robert Young
results.brief_description: Based on the novel “No place to hide” by Ted Allbeury, “Hostage” is about a man on the run, a man who wants nothing more to do with the life of a British Secret Service Agent. A professional killer who murders in the name of Queen and country, John Rennie (Sam Neill) has one more job to do. A senior defence analyst is taken hostage by terrorists and it is up to Rennie to secure the release of the hostage and eliminate the terrorists. This leads him to Argentina, to secrecy and corruption, violence and seduction and eventually to the fatal mistake of falling in love. Plans start to fall apart, doubts begin to set in and Rennie’s questioning of his orders make him a liability - a danger to National Security. Cast also includes Talisa Soto, James Fox, Art Malik, Cristina Higueras, Michael Kitchen, Jean Pierre Reguerraz.

results.title: Host
results.brief_description: Lucas states: In this video, I participate in an on-line therapy session directed by the system operator of a streetside multi-media kiosk. As I indulge in a virtual conversation about a troublesome relationship, the session instantly becomes an amalgamation of daytime television and tabloid, wherein the surveillance camera becomes the eye of the media.
